attributes.action: Return the Scottish Stone of Destiny to its rightful home in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Stone of Destiny, also known as the Stone of Scone, was used in Scotland to crown the new kings.  In the late 13th Century, it was taken from Scotland by the king of England.  At some point in the 20th Century, several Scots stole the Stone back and returned it to Scotland, where it was found and returned to England.  We petition the Stone be handed over to the Scottish Parliament, and help restore Scottish pride.
